verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: alleged] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] — [ARGM-MNR: without providing any evidence] — [ARG1: that special counsel Robert Mueller 's investigation will meddle in the midterm elections to benefit Democrats] .
